amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit the use of funds by EPA in contravention of the Clean Air Act provision requiring EPA to evaluate the impact of its actions with respect to jobs in America.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 120 printed in House Report 114-683 to prohibit the use of funds by EPA in contravention of the Clean Air Act provision requiring EPA to evaluate the impact of its actions with respect to jobs in America.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weber (TX) amendment (A098) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A098) offered by Mr. Weber (TX).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Weber (TX) amendment (A098) Agreed to by voice vote.
